data.name: Animal Diner
data.detailed_description:
Run and expand a Diner while serving different animals their favorite dish. Play alone or up with three other players to run the Diner as effectively as possible. Either play in campaign mode and build up your Diner over time, play quick missions and ever more challenging scenarios or go Chef to Chef in the versus mode.

  • Over 50 different recipes to prepare
  • Make your own food menus
  • Design your own Diners
  • Expand the Diner with different improvements and upgrades
  • 1-4 player co-op
  • Campaign mode
  • Mission mode
  • Versus mode

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
